name: Wizard of the Fell Tree
description: It's your first day as a Lumberjack and you accidentally released an an Evil Wizard trapped inside a tree. Not the best first day ever, but probably not the worst either. Now you'll have to team up with your fellow Lumberjacks and two part-time guardians of the forest to defeat him. This is a short visual novel made just for fun. The game has two slightly different endings.
